description:
Chain-in website: http://chain-in.org/

Attendees are expected to learn real stuff on blockchains starting from technical and not ending with social aspects. Speakers are gradually added to the website; the final list will ensure having a good diversity of blockchain-related topics like CS, business, economics, law, etc.

Experts at the venue and speakers will also be invited to a rounded-table meeting to discuss the future of the technology.

An attendee?
Reserve your seat for one or two days according to your interest here: http://chain-in.org/register.php.

A speaker?
Suggest your talk here: http://chain-in.org/speaker.php

A sponsor?
See sponsorship plans here: http://chain-in.org/sponsorship.php
name: Chain-in Conference in Porto
